scripts.blc: broken-link-checker --recursive --ordered --exclude https://t.me --exclude https://software.intel.com/content --exclude https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/SpecialPublications/NIST.SP.800-185.pdf --exclude https://support.ledger.com/hc/en-us/articles --exclude https://www.linkedin.com --exclude https://csrc.nist.gov/publications/detail/fips/180/4/final --exclude https://www.coinspeaker.com/oasis-protocol-partnership-meta/ --exclude https://www.binance.com/en/support --exclude https://www.coinbase.com --filter-level 3 http://localhost:3000/
